title: How does RiotGames define what is and what's not META? What's a Bad Game and What's Inting etc
body:
Even RiotGames don't understand what they are. That's why they implemented a BOT into the system to justify players worth banning or not. Or to be punish or not. 

My Top lane ran it down Mid and die over and over, that's just a Bad game, I die to Minion....... now that's fucking inting. 
--------------
My Jungler is afk, like literally afk he's not even afk farming the jungle, he's in the base not moving. That's consider trying really hard, while I'm clearing wave trying to stall the game is giving up.
---------------
My Support (Nubrac is sitting mid) that's called New Meta.

Whole team goes Aram mid, now that's trolling. 
----------------
This game is so broken, that's why it's worth to just FF15 a losing game, why keep going to be mark as a troll, inter, afk, etc
